message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with an authentication scheme based on linear codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The scheme is designed to provide security against attacks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The use of linear codes also relates to coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also mentions access structure, which is a topic in distributed systems (cs.DS) and the security of receivers, which is a topic in security and privacy (cs.SI).
